prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of molten lava and metal.
I want a fire and steel type Pokemon with a rugged, industrial design and glowing accents.
Generate a mythical creature that thrives in volcanic regions, showcasing powerful heat-based abilities.
Make a Pokemon that features a robust body, fiery colors, and a fierce attitude towards opponents.
Imagine a creature that combines the strength of metal with the ferocity of fire, perfect for fierce battles.
Design a Pokemon that has a unique combination of fire and steel elements with a rugged appearance.
Show me a powerful Pokemon that resembles molten magma and has an intimidating presence.
